newsitem.title: TAIWAN: PRESS DIGEST - Taiwan newspapers - May 19.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Taiwan newspapers - May 19.

text.p: These are the leading stories in the Taiwan press on Monday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
CHINA TIMES - Taiwan announces severance of diplomatic relations with Bahamas
Tens of thousands of Taiwan residents take to streets to demand cabinet reshuffle and president's acknowledgement of mistakes.
UNITED DAILY NEWS - Taiwan cuts diplomatic relations with Bahamas.
Panama highly concerned over Taiwan's failure to live up to economic aid promises
LIBERTY TIMES - Domino effect may appear after Bahamas switches ties to Beijing from Taipei
COMMERCIAL TIMES - Communications ministry opposes raising of ceiling for foreign investment in telecom industry to 50 percent
DHL Worldwide Express to set up Asia-Pacific transshipment centre in 2005
ECONOMIC DAILY NEWS - Securities and Exchange Commission concerned about stock transactions during May 20 first anniversary of President Lee Teng-hui's inauguration
Export growth in second quarter seen slow at 3.3 percent
